    public class SpringLNDLightningHandler
extends SimpleBaseLNDLightningHandler

        protected java.lang.String getTLSCertPath()
                                   throws InternalErrorException
        The path to the LND tls certificate to trust, securing the communication to the LND node. Should point to an file readable by the current user..
        Specified by:

      • getMacaroonPath

        protected java.lang.String getMacaroonPath()
                                    throws InternalErrorException
        The path to the macaroon file that is used to authenticate to the LND node. The macaroon should have invoice creation rights.
        Specified by:
        getMacaroonPath in class SimpleBaseLNDLightningHandler
        Returns:
        the path to the macaroon to use.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if problems occurred getting the configuration information.

      • getNodeInfoFromConfiguration

        protected NodeInfo getNodeInfoFromConfiguration()
                                         throws InternalErrorException
        Method to retrieve node information from configuration or null if not configured.

        Used when the LND macaroon doesn't have access rights to retrieve LND Node information.

        Specified by:
        getNodeInfoFromConfiguration in class BaseLNDLightningHandler
        Returns:
        populated NodeInfo from configuration or nulll if no configuration exists.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if problems occurred parsing the configuration.

      • getSupportedCurrencyCode

        protected java.lang.String getSupportedCurrencyCode()
        Method to retrieve configured supported currency code. Should be one of CryptoAmount CURRENCY_CODE_ constants.
        Specified by:
        getSupportedCurrencyCode in class BaseLNDLightningHandler
        Returns:
        The used currency code
